data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
The match has been interrupted.
The whistle has gone to start the match.
Free kick Gil Vicente.
Throw-in for Gil Vicente at Estadio do Bessa XXI.
Boavista awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Helder Malheiro signals a free kick to Gil Vicente in their own half.
In Porto a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Boavista needs to be cautious. Gil Vicente have an attacking throw-in.
Gil Vicente have a dangerous throw-in.
Ball safe as Boavista is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Gil Vicente in their own half.
Helder Malheiro signals a throw-in for Gil Vicente, close to Boavista's area.
Boavista awarded a free kick in their own half.
At Estadio do Bessa XXI, Boavista are penalized for being offside.
Throw-in Boavista.
Throw-in for Gil Vicente in their own half.
Helder Malheiro awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in Gil Vicente.
Boavista push upfield but Helder Malheiro quickly pulls them for offside.
Gil Vicente drives forward and Bozhidar Kraev gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Gil Vicente surge into the attack at Estadio do Bessa XXI but Sandro Lima’s header is off-target.
Goal kick for Boavista at Estadio do Bessa XXI.
Boavista to take a throw-in in Gil Vicente territory.
Boavista have been awarded a corner by Helder Malheiro.
Gil Vicente have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Can Gil Vicente capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Boavista's half?
Gil Vicente's Yves Baraye gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Porto.
Helder Malheiro waits before resuming play because Helton Leite for Boavista is still down.
Helton Leite is back on his feet again.
Throw-in for Boavista in their own half.
Helder Malheiro awards the home team a throw-in.
Corner awarded to Boavista.
Throw-in for Boavista close to the penalty box.
Free kick for Boavista in the half of Gil Vicente.
Free kick for Boavista in their own half.
In Porto, Boavista push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Gil Vicente awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Helder Malheiro signals a free kick to Boavista.
Yusupha Njie for Boavista gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Gil Vicente goal kick.
Gil Vicente are coming forward and Sandro Lima gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Helder Malheiro awards Boavista a goal kick.
Gil Vicente pushes forward through Lourency, whose finish on goal is saved.
Free kick for Boavista in the half of Gil Vicente.
In Porto Boavista attack through Yusupha Njie. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Porto.
Boavista attack but Nikola Stojiljkovic's header doesn't find the target.
Gil Vicente have a goal kick.
Helder Malheiro signals a Boavista throw-in in Gil Vicente's half.
Helder Malheiro signals a free kick to Gil Vicente in their own half.
Throw-in for Gil Vicente in the half of Boavista.
Throw-in for Gil Vicente at Estadio do Bessa XXI.
Can Boavista get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gil Vicente's half?
Gil Vicente to take a throw-in in Boavista territory.
Attention is being given to Boavista’s Cassiano and play has been suspended briefly.
Cassiano for Boavista is back on the field again.
Cassiano (Boavista) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Boavista drive upfield and Cassiano gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Gil Vicente defender.
Corner awarded to Boavista.
Yaw Ackah of Boavista gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Gil Vicente goal kick.
Helder Malheiro signals a Gil Vicente throw-in in Boavista's half.
Gil Vicente's Yves Baraye gets in a shot on goal at Estadio do Bessa XXI. But the effort is unsuccessful.
2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Gil Vicente awarded a free kick in their own half.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
Free kick Gil Vicente.
Ball safe as Boavista is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Helder Malheiro awards the away team a throw-in.
Can Boavista get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gil Vicente's half?
Helder Malheiro signals a free kick to Boavista.
In Porto a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Boavista are pushing forward but Carraca's finish is wide of the goal.
Helder Malheiro awards Gil Vicente a goal kick.
Gil Vicente awarded a free kick in their own half.
Helder Malheiro signals a free kick to Gil Vicente in their own half.
Free kick for Boavista in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Boavista in Porto.
Boavista advance rapidly upfield but Helder Malheiro blows for offside.
In Porto a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Gil Vicente have a dangerous throw-in.
Free kick for Gil Vicente in the half of Boavista.
Fabiano (Boavista) gets a yellow card.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Boavista needs to be cautious. Gil Vicente have an attacking throw-in.
Free kick for Boavista in their own half.
Ball safe as Boavista is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Boavista at Estadio do Bessa XXI.
Throw-in for Gil Vicente in the half of Boavista.
Gil Vicente have been awarded a corner by Helder Malheiro.
Boavista awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The match at Estadio do Bessa XXI has been interrupted briefly for a check on Fernando Fonseca, who is down injured.
Fernando Fonseca has recovered and rejoins the match in Porto.
Throw-in Gil Vicente.
Helder Malheiro signals a free kick to Boavista in their own half.
Throw-in for Gil Vicente in the half of Boavista.
Daniel Ramos is making the team's first substitution at Estadio do Bessa XXI with Paulinho replacing Yusupha Njie.
Boavista to take a throw-in in Gil Vicente territory.
Boavista make their second substitution with Mateus replacing Cassiano.
Helder Malheiro signals a Boavista throw-in in Gil Vicente's half.
In Porto, Mateus of Boavista is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Gil Vicente awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Gil Vicente in their own half.
Throw-in for Gil Vicente close to the penalty box.
Goal kick for Boavista at Estadio do Bessa XXI.
Helder Malheiro signals a free kick to Gil Vicente in their own half.
Free kick for Gil Vicente in their own half.
Ricardo Costa for Boavista has been booked by Helder Malheiro and receives a first yellow card.
Helder Malheiro awards Gil Vicente a goal kick.
Ruben Ribeiro is on a sub for Yves Baraye for Gil Vicente.
Gil Vicente are whistled for offside.
Gil Vicente awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal kick for Boavista at Estadio do Bessa XXI.
Helder Malheiro signals a free kick to Gil Vicente.
Boavista awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Gil Vicente capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Boavista's half?
Free kick for Boavista in their own half.
Can Gil Vicente get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Boavista's half?
Corner awarded to Gil Vicente.
Sandro Lima scores to make it 0-1 at Estadio do Bessa XXI.
Nogueira instrumental with a fine assist.
Throw-in for Boavista at Estadio do Bessa XXI.
Free kick Boavista.
At Estadio do Bessa XXI, Gil Vicente are penalized for being offside.
The home team have replaced Yaw Ackah with Heriberto Tavares. This is the third substitution made today by Daniel Ramos.
Helder Malheiro signals a throw-in for Boavista, close to Gil Vicente's area.
Miguel Reisinho for Boavista drives towards goal at Estadio do Bessa XXI. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Boavista have been awarded a corner by Helder Malheiro.
Lucas (Boavista) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Gil Vicente have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Helder Malheiro signals a free kick to Boavista in their own half.
The away team replace Bozhidar Kraev with Joao Afonso.
Lourency is booked for the away team.
In Porto Boavista drive forward through Heriberto Tavares. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Boavista's Nikola Stojiljkovic misses with an attempt on goal.
Gil Vicente awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Gil Vicente goal kick.
Samuel Dias Lino is replacing Lourency for the away team.
Ball safe as Gil Vicente is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Boavista awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Important block from the Boavista defence as Samuel Dias Lino fires in a strike for Gil Vicente.
The fourth official's board shows 4 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in high up the field for Boavista in Porto.
Free kick for Boavista in the half of Gil Vicente.
Boavista are coming forward and Heriberto Tavares gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Porto.
Free kick for Boavista in their own half.
Sandro Lima gets his shot on target but fails to score for Gil Vicente.
Ruben Ribeiro (Gil Vicente) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Helder Malheiro signals a free kick to Boavista in their own half.
Helder Malheiro signals a free kick to Boavista in their own half.
Nogueira (Gil Vicente) has received a yellow card from Helder Malheiro.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Porto to check on Joao Afonso, who is grimacing with pain.
